name: Victory (Prototype)
description:
A prototype for a 3D top-down adventure game built in Unity. 

  • Movement - WASD/Controller Left Stick
  • Lock-On Target - R/Left Stick Press
  • Switch Target - Space/Right Stick Right
  • Inventory - I/Select
  • Special Ability - Q/Button North
  • Ability 1 - E/Button West
  • Ability 2 - Shift/Button East
  • Primary Attack - Left Mouse Button/Right Trigger
  • Secondary Attack - Right Mouse Button/Left Trigger
  • Interact - F/Right Stick Press
  • Pause Game - Escape/Start Button
